alert.note: Alert for Northwest Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 10:57PM MST until January 07 at 11:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SUNDAY ABOVE 3500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 3500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches 3500 to 5000 feet. Above 5000 feet, 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Northwest Plateau. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Icy and snowpacked roadways are possible along Highway 389 between Colorado City and Fredonia.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
